text: Ara yara manda arjana kare mandakajera pratiphala habe tara anurupa, ara tadera acchadana habe apamana. Tadera jan'ya allah theke kono raksaka ne'i, -- yena tadera mukhamandala acchadita hayeche nisithera gahana andhakarera ekansa diye. Era'i hacche agunera adhibasi, tara sekhane thakabe dirghakala.
